title: All of Me
description: Sometimes you have to give all or nothing…Aiden O’Connell—exonerated, determined, steadfast, and brokenhearted.I tried to stand by him. I failed. After the attack, my mind altered. I couldn’t see anything but my ex—all men are the same.Our love now gone.Everything is harder.His father totally out of control, I have signs of PTSD, and an unexpected death makes everything change in ways we couldn’t have predicted.Life with Aiden was never meant to be easy, but now maybe it can move forward for us both… From International Bestselling Author K E Osborn comes, All of Me Book Three in the Trust Me Series (previously published in 2014). This series has been re-edited with new content and a new cover.
author: K.E. Osborn
